contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} '''USS ''North Carolina''''' may refer to: *{{USS|North Carolina|1820}} was a [[ship of the line]] launched in 1820 and sold in 1867 *{{USS|North Carolina|ACR-12}} was a {{sclass-|Tennessee|cruiser}} launched in 1906 and escorted troop transports during World War I and sold for scrap in 1930 *{{USS|North Carolina|BB-52}} was a ''South Dakota''-class battleship, laid down but soon canceled by the [[Washington Naval Treaty]] in 1920 *{{USS|North Carolina|BB-55}} is a {{sclass-|North Carolina|battleship}} launched in 1940; decommissioned in 1947 and a museum ship in Wilmington North Carolina *{{USS|North Carolina|SSN-777}} is a {{sclass-|Virginia|submarine}} commissioned in 2008 and currently in service ;See also *[[CSS North Carolina|CSS ''North Carolina'']]. {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:North Carolina, USS}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]] [[Category:United States Navy North Carolina-related ships]]
